title: Top Places to visit in Yerraguntla, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Yerraguntla is a Leading Industrial town in Kadapa district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Yerraguntla Mandal of Kadapa revenue division.
Geography
Yerraguntla is located at 14.6333°N 78.5333°E. It has an average elevation of 152 meters (501 feet).
